manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: OVERVIEW: Experience your favorite movies and shows on a vibrant, stunning 4K UHD screen, using the Universal Guide to surf smoothly and select content. Everything you watch is automatically upscaled into 4K for stunningly vivid color and detail. Experience crystal clear colors that are fine-tuned to deliver a naturally crisp and vivid picture.The ultra-fast processor transforms everything you watch into stunning 4K.The sleek, elegant, and minimalistic design draws you into the screen from any angle.See what you’ve been missing on the crisp, clear picture that’s 4X the resolution of Full HD.High Dynamic Range lets you enjoy a wide spectrum of colors and visual details, even in dark scenes.Get into the game faster with Auto Game Mode which automatically optimizes the screen and minimizes input lag, giving you more control. Enjoy a smooth gaming experience without motion blur and judder.

4K Picture Quality Optimized picture performance with 4K UHD Processor High Dynamic Range lets you enjoy a wide spectrum of colors and visual details, even in dark scenes. Real 4K Resolution The ultra-fast processor transforms everything you watch into stunning 4K. Knows when you're ready to play Get into the game faster with Auto Game Mode which automatically optimizes the screen and minimizes input lag, giving you more control. Enjoy a smooth gaming experience without motion blur and judder Spend time watching, not searching Universal Guide provides a list of curated content from broadcast and streaming channels, personalized just for you. Easily find your favorite content, all in one place See stunning detail Powerful picture quality Auto Game Mode (ALLM) Universal Guide

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Broken, replaced, and perfect
reviews.reviewText: I received this television and it wouldn’t come on at all. I returned and replaced with the same exact model and had no issues at all. Great tv, great picture, must have just received a dud

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great picture and nice looking
reviews.reviewText: Vert well packaged to prevent scratches. The TV is not too heavy and the color and quality are superb. The sound is very good. The TV looks great in our medium sized room. It is a good size to have friends over to watch sporting events or for movie watching on the big screen without the movie theatre.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not very bright
reviews.reviewText: Love the features on this TV but couple of things let it down.1. Volume, not as loud as it could be. I've used it on max a few times.2. Screen seems very dark on a number of TV programmers, unable to improve brightness/contrast enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It came just as described and in good condition. Delivered within timeline promised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT ROKU/AMAZON/User friendly, cheap!
reviews.reviewText: This TV is a downgrade from my 43” Sceptre. UI is slow, remote app never brings up the keyboard, I’m still using a plug-in Roku for half of my apps, sound sucks, picture doesn’t look any better than my 43” 720p Sceptre from 2016. Wish I kept the box. Also, the sound is half a second behind the picture! Regardless of source/channel/sound output. If anyone buys this I’ll give you $100 for the box so I can send mine back!Update: it’s been a month and this product continues to disappoint. It is a daily reminder of what a terrible purchase I made. This TV is terrible, disfunctional, unreliable and just low quality cheap cheap cheap. I will likely throw it in the trash as soon as I can afford to replace it.Update #2: it’s May. This product continues to inspire doubt and drive self depreciation every night when I stare miserably at the lackluster and disappointing screen of low resolution and overall garbage picture quality. However, I must say that the most astounding feature of all is the remarkably non-user-friendly interface, you are required to interact with in order to change the channel or look at the guide or change the source. It is unbelievably painful to cycle through sources. The user interface is remarkably unable to interact with common place applications like Spotify or YouTube and, time and time again I am forced to transfer from the Soundsystem in my house, that I paid so much to enjoy, to my handheld cell phone so that I can actually watch anything for more than five seconds without the entire system crapping out due to this products Inability to deliver on any single one of its promises.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Should brought this TVfromrhw start
reviews.reviewText: It had taken me years to finally have a SnartTV that actually lives up to the definition. The controls are not complicated nor dificukt to figure out. The assemble took nere minutes. The TVis smart enough to switch over to the gaming port as soon as I turn on my PlayStation. Once switched off, it swutches back to previous thing you were watching (free samsung plus TV, for example) I will stick to this brand for now on. Oh and the picture quality is top notch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up and good picture. Purchased as an Amazon flash sale so value for money was great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TVs are smarter than people!!!
reviews.reviewText: The set is gorgeous. Picture is brilliant, sound is fine, but the remote control device had me stumped. I fiddled with it and went thru a series of trial and error and finally got the darn thing to retrieve what I asked of it!! But all in all, I think the set is really good. It's not a particular bargain price, but good overall There is so much to choose from with regard to channel selections, you would have to stay awake 24/7 to watch them all. But there is something for everyone's taste in movies and programs.
